title: Looking for an oceanian account lvl 30 for ranked
body:
Hi,

I am a french league of legends player who came for 6 months in australia and I am looking for an account lvl 30 to play.
I would be glad to help you in ranked (I am an old european platinum)

My main account is **Abydox** (EUW)
but you can also watch the account **darquevador** (EUW) it is a smurf I carried from bronze 5 to silver 5 in one week

Cheers

replies.body:
Hey there,

Account sharing is against Riot's ToS, as is boosting. I'd suggest you not follow through with any account  buying/trading as the account/s will just be banned.
